1.0.1.en: Move to package beeclear@1.0.0. App icon update. Added NL app store translation. Minor fixes.

2.0.0.en: Rewrite to SDK3 and Homey Compose. Fixed offPeak state after app restart. Fixed several 0-value bugs. Http timeout depending on poll time. package beeclear@1.1.0. Ledring code updated.

2.1.0.en: Fix tariff change flow trigger. Added filter unrealistic values option.

2.2.1.en: Fix flow start before capabilities update. Log tarrif change.

2.2.2.en: Changed internal FLOW code. Fix flow AND card for tariff sometimes incorrect.

3.0.0.en: HP2023 compatibility fixed. Belgian smart meter support added. 3 phase info added. Several fixes and optimizations. Removed app settings. beeclear@2.0.1.

3.0.1.en: Fixed using HTTPS with self signed certificate. beeclear@2.0.2.

3.1.0.en: Added Homey total imported/exported energy capability. Updated device image. Minor fixes.
